question:
Consider the following statements about the Global Tiger Initiative (GTI):
  1. It is an initiative led by the 13 tiger range countries (TRCs)
  2. World Bank is one of the founding fathers of the GTI
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is correct</u>. Global Tiger Initiative (GTI) is led by the 13 tiger range countries (TRCs). <u>Second statement is correct</u>. The GTIâ€™s founding partners include the World Bank, the Global Environment Facility (GEF), the Smithsonian Institution, Save the Tiger Fund, and International Tiger Coalition (representing more than 40 non-government organizations).
